Basic Information.name: Unique ID
Basic Information.help: Global unique ID of this object.

Basic Information.name: Unique Name
Basic Information.help: Global unique Name of this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner ID
Basic Information.help: ID of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner Group ID
Basic Information.help: ID of group of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Original Object ID
Basic Information.help: ID of source object of this object, if this object is a copy of an existing object.

Basic Information.name: Child Object IDs
Basic Information.help: ID of all child objects, if this object is a container object.

Basic Information.name: ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter a unique identifier used in your lab.

Basic Information.name: Description
Basic Information.help: Please enter detailes about this restriction.

Basic Information.name: Restriction Site
Basic Information.help: Please enter the restriction site. Example: G/AATTC

Basic Information.name: Concentration
Basic Information.help: Please indicate the concentration of the restriction enzyme. Example: 20,000 units/ml

Basic Information.name: Reaction Conditions
Basic Information.help: Please enter the reaction conditions. Example: 1X NEBuffer Incubate at 37ºC

Basic Information.name: Heat Inactivation
Basic Information.help: Please indicate if the restriction enzyme can be inactivated by heat. Example: 65ºC for 20 min

Basic Information.name: Methylation Sensitivity
Basic Information.help: Please indicate if restriction enzymes are sensitive to methylation. Example: dam methylation: Not sensitive, dcm methylation: not sensitive, CpG methylation: blocked by some combinations of overlapping

Origin.name: Distributor
Origin.help: Please enter the name of the distributor (lab, company), from whom the restriction enzyme was obtained. If possible insert a link which leads directly to the webpage of the company. Example: https://www.neb.com/products/r0101-ecori#pd-description

Origin.name: Distributor Product ID
Origin.help: Please enter the product number of the distributor.

Additional Information.name: Contact Person
Additional Information.help: Please enter the names and departments of the contact persons or principal investigators who are responsible for this entry and should be contacted for further questions.

Additional Information.name: Aliquots Sent To
Additional Information.help: Please enter when and to whom aliquots have been sent.

Additional Information.name: Notes
Additional Information.help: Please enter and link all further information which is important to the restriction.
